titleInfo.title: WAS brought to the City Police Jail.

mods.abstract: WAS brought to the City Police Jail on the 9th of May, 1862, the black boy JACKSON or ARONSays he belongs to MrVentress or William Ventress, who lives in the parish of Ascension, LaHe is 5 feet 5 1/2 inches high, has two scar on the forehead, long beard and bushy hair, a cut on the finger of the left hand, speaks English only, and is aged about 27 yearsThe owner will call and claim his property according to lawMIGUEL HERNANDEZ, JR., Keeper of City Police JailRegistered May 12, 1862EDEVENPORT, Clerk of Comptrollermy13 15t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866
